From: Christian Everdell

Subject: RE: U.S. 
v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) -- Renewed Bail Motion Reply 
Memorandum and Exhibits (to be Filed Under Seal) 
Date: Wed, 23 Dec 2020 18:08:04 +0000 
Attachments: Reply_Memorandum_re_Renewed_Bail_Application_Final.pdf; 
Reply_Memorandum_re_Renewed_Bail_Application_Final_Redacted.pdf 
Inline-Images: image001.jpg; image002.jpg; image004.jpg; image006.jpg 
Dear Judge Nathan — 
In preparing to file the reply brief pursuant to the Court's order (Dkt. 101), we noticed a typographical error in the reply 
dilie
um.
We have spoken to the government and they have no objection to the defense making this revision (on pages i 
and 8) before filing the memorandum on the public docket. Accordingly, attached to this email are revised versions of the 
unredacted and redacted memorandum reflecting this change. We will file the revised redacted version on the docket 
today. We apologize for the error. 
Regards, 
Christian R Everdell 
COHEN & GRESSER LLP 
800 Third Avenue 
New York, NY 10022

Attached please find the following documents submitted to the Court and all counsel under seal pursuant to the Court's 
order (Dkt. 89): 
1. Cover letter 
2. Reply memorandum (unredacted) 
3. Reply memorandum (redacted) 
4. Accompanying exhibits A-B 
Regards,
